name: verifyToken
description: Verify the user accepted the login request and get a authentication token. The user email address and the token received after requesting the login must be added to the URL as a query string with the names `email` and `token`.

token.description: The token returned when the login was requested.

tokenName.description: The desired name for the token. It will be displayed on the user account details.

ssoUserId.description: The SAML Profile ID, when connecting a SAML Profile to a Team member for the first time.

$ul: **email**: Email address of the authenticated user.
**teamId**: When completing SAML Single Sign-On authentication, this will be the ID of the Team that was authenticated for.
**token**: The user authentication token that can be used to perform API requests.
